m_szDocTitle: Everyday drivers: Half-ton Titan joins Nissan’s pickup lineup | Driving
m_szDocSumamry: Everyday drivers: Half-ton Titan joins Nissan’s pickup lineup The New York Auto Show has its fair share of practical vehicles, too By Driving , David Booth and John LeBlanc Originally published: March 23, 2016 SMALL MEDIUM LARGE As much as the auto shows may showcase the glitz and glamour of everything on four wheels, the everyday drivers – from crossovers and pickups to compact sedans and hybrids – are the bread and butter of the business. Here are some of the notable mainstream automakers debuting at this year’s New York show. 2017 Nissan Titan 2017 Nissan Titan XD Darren Begg, Driving What
